name: Block Puzzle Legend World
description:
Block Puzzle is a new addictive puzzle game. The application is ideal for people of all ages and skill levels. This addictive puzzle will entertain you on the way home and help you to spend your free time.     You need to clear the playing field and stay calm while the passions in the game are heated, because this fascinating puzzle game is not as simple as it might seem. You just need to start, and you're already on the hook. Enjoy the game completely FREE!

RULES OF THE GAME • Simply drag the blocks to an empty field. • Create continuous lines horizontally or vertically and get points for it. • The game ends when there is no space left on the square field for blocks of any shape. • You can flip the unit by using the rotate button. • Increase your score with a multiplier by clearing several lines at once. • Do not worry! Time is not limited!

FEATURES • 1010 - a simple classic game, in the field of the playing field 10 x 10 tiles. • Simple rules and ease of management. • Many multicolored blocks and bright graphics. • Design "chameleon". • Beautiful icons and smooth animation. • Soothing music and great visual effects. • Set high scores and share them via Facebook.
